meanings.sent1: The inefficaciousnesses of the old treatment led to the development of a new one.
meanings.sent2: The inefficaciousnesses of the plan became evident when it failed to produce any results.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the inefficaciousnesses of his magic tricks always made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The inefficaciousnesses of the broken compass left the explorers feeling lost in the vast wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The inefficaciousnesses of the leaky roof were highlighted by the constant dripping during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The inefficaciousnesses of the medicine surprised the doctors as it failed to cure the illness.
meanings.sent2: She was frustrated by the inefficaciousnesses of her attempts to fix the broken clock.
meanings.sent3: The inefficaciousnesses of the robot's dance moves made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The inefficaciousnesses of the old car engine were compared to a tired horse struggling to move.
meanings.sent5: The inefficaciousnesses of the flashlight's dim light left them stumbling in the dark cave.
